newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss 3-mth money market claims yield 1.685 pct.
newsitem.headline: Swiss 3-mth money market claims yield 1.685 pct.

text.p: The annual yield on the latest issue of Swiss federal government three-month money market claims is 1.685 percent, down from the previous issue's 1.748 percent, the Swiss National Bank said.
The latest issue, to be paid for on April 3, raised 867.35 million Swiss francs and was priced at 99.576 percent.
The previous issue, paid for on March 27, raised 1,187.10 million and was priced at 99.560 percent. -- Zurich Editorial +41 1 631 7340
